text:
Jof Davies engineered MTDCNC’s email marketing framework, sending approximately one million emails per month. Responsibilities include:

- Building reusable boilerplate HTML templates with extensive VML support for Outlook.
- Ensuring cross-client responsive behaviour across iOS Mail, Gmail, Outlook desktop, and mobile clients.
- Implementing fallback strategies for non-supporting clients.
- Monitoring deliverability through SPF, DKIM, DMARC, MX reputation, and blacklist checks.
- Maintaining clean email lists through automated unsubscription, suppression, and tagging systems.
- Performing detailed engagement analysis using the MTDCNC_Engagement_Report_Package.

This domain represents one of Jof’s strongest technical specialisms.
